target: What do you want me to use?
context: <user>  Please help play a song. I am really in a bad mood. <system>  What genre of songs do you prefer? <user>  I feel like listening to The Water Fountain song. <system>  Please have it check, play the song The Water Fountain on the TV. <user>  Yes, everything is right. I forgot what album it does belong, I used to listen to it when it was first released. <system>  It is from Narrated For You album. The song has started playing at the TV. <user>  Thanks! It soothes my mood. Now I need to make a transfer to a savings account. I promised that I will lend my brother a small amount money. <system>
